desc: Thorndon Park Produce is a bunchline provider that has been growing in Australia since 1945. Our growing experiences dates back with four generations of De Ieso family ' Luigi, Salvatore, Danny ,Chris and Anthony. We grow quality products such as Spring Onions, Radish,Parsley, Spinach ,Silver Beet, Beetroot and Kale an

layout.text: South Australian Family Owned | Growing fresh bunchlines since 1945
